alert.note: Alert for Northeast Prince William Sound (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 08 at 5:30PM AKST until February 09 at 1:00PM AKST by NWS Anchorage
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 1 AM TO 1 PM AKST WEDNESDAY THROUGH THOMPSON PASS... * WHAT...Blowing snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 7 to 14 inches. Winds gusting as high as 45 mph. * WHERE...Thompson Pass. * WHEN...From 1 AM to 1 PM AKST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Areas of blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility to one half mile or less for extended periods of time. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Increased winds and additional snow are expected this evening as a front tracks into Southcentral. The potential for blowing snow will gradually diminish by midday Wednesday. Snowfall rates of up to 2 inches per hour are possible during the heaviest snow Wednesday morning.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. For the latest road conditions call 5 1 1 or visit 511.alaska.gov.
